}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Features 5GHz 802.11ac 3x3 and external Rx filter, DAXA-92 delivers up to 1.3Gbps data rate and provides the excellent radio rejection against the interfering signal from the 2nd 2.4GHz Wi-Fi module on dual-band dual con-current applications.
"48DAXA01.SGA" and "2012/02/01" is silkscreened on the board pictured in '''Unex''''s photos.
Additional specifications, per '''Unex'''s product page, follow.. *PAMs: '''Skyworks''' SE5003L1 *Dimension: [[Dimensions::50 mm (W) x 50.8 mm (L)]]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
